data.author: Mobile to Go

changelog.release_notes:
* new app architecture
* added chalk, diorite and emery support
* new step and distance InfoPanel
* a lot of bugfixes and improvements

* CW fix
* total new InfoPanel architecture
* small bugfixes/ optimizations
disabled first vibration on bluetooth dis-/ connect

* fixed appmessage returns error first occurred in V3.6 of SDK 
* some minor optimizations

* fixed property dialog issue
* merged all InfoWatch improvements
* pebble aplite only supports tag events

The new OutDoorWatch is a first step and...

* ... runs on (the old) pebble as well as the new pebble time.
* ... supports (only on pebble time) up to 10 color look and feels!
* ... has (only on pebble time) in addition a much better gesture recognition algorithm. In particular (only on pebble time) a new y-axis twitch was added to change "fixed" panels. This enables you to use FixedPanels similar you used InfoPanels before.
* ... provides in the settings properties to customize the used InfoPanels.
* ... has a new Romanian language resource file.
* ... offers (only on pebble time) new air pressure and wind speed forecast diagrams.
* ... (hopefully) fixes the still remaining seldom crashes.
* ... has a lot of (layout) improvements.

features:
* added mph
bufixes:
* fixed buffer overrun
* fixed accelerator control bug
* fixed km/h bug
improvements:
* new lib
* small fixes
fixed weather icons in fixed layer

data.description: A smart watchface with a lot of outdoor information. Rather additive the time, day and date (in nearly any language), the bluetooth connection as well as the battery state is shown on top e.g. the sunrise, sunset, estimated sun hours, your current GPS location, compass information, the wind direction as well as weather forecast, the estimated walked distance, counted steps or the air pressure forecast. InfoPanels are switched by accelerator control or in 60 sec delay. Shown are the current weather, a map with the day/night boundary, a weather forecast, a magnetic compass, a map of your current/ a fix location, the estimated distance interpreted by a funny picture, the air pressure or wind speed.
